title: Toys 'R' Us vendors scramble for shelf life as doors shut
text:
Toys 'R' Us vendors scramble for shelf life as doors shut 10:21pm IST - 01:41 
Toy and children furniture makers are 'exhausted' after Toys 'R' Us announced it is shutting all stores, leaving some unpaid vendors facing a bleak future and others, like Joe Shamie, president of Delta Children Products, strategizing to survive. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
